eu.davidea.flexibleadapter

Interface FlexibleAdapter.OnItemMoveListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FlexibleAdapter.OnActionStateListener
    Enclosing class:
    FlexibleAdapter<T extends IFlexible>

    public static interface FlexibleAdapter.OnItemMoveListener
extends FlexibleAdapter.OnActionStateListener
    Since:
    26/01/2016

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onItemMove(int fromPosition, int toPosition)
      Called when an item has been dragged far enough to trigger a move.
      boolean shouldMoveItem(int fromPosition, int toPosition)
      Called when the item would like to be swapped.

      • Methods inherited from interface eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.FlexibleAdapter.OnActionStateListener

        onActionStateChanged

    • Method Detail

      • shouldMoveItem

        boolean shouldMoveItem(int fromPosition,
                       int toPosition)
        Called when the item would like to be swapped.

        Delegate this permission to the user.

        Parameters:
        fromPosition - the potential start position of the dragged item
        toPosition - the potential resolved position of the swapped item
        Returns:
        return true if the items can swap (onItemMove() will be called), false otherwise (nothing happens)
        Since:
        5.0.0-b8
        See Also:
        FlexibleAdapter.onItemMove(int, int)

      • onItemMove

        void onItemMove(int fromPosition,
                int toPosition)
        Called when an item has been dragged far enough to trigger a move. This is called every time an item is shifted, and not at the end of a "drop" event.

        The end of the "drop" event is instead handled by FlexibleViewHolder.onItemReleased(int).

        Tip: Here, you should call FlexibleAdapter.invalidateItemDecorations(long) to recalculate item offset if any item decoration has been set.
        Parameters:
        fromPosition - the start position of the moved item
        toPosition - the resolved position of the moved item
        Since:
        5.0.0-b1
        See Also:
        FlexibleAdapter.shouldMove(int, int)
